setup_script_description: sets focus on the first radio button
task: read information about unchecked radio button
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, read information about the radio button.
output_assertions: State of the radio button, 'unchecked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 1, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
